description: Example structure of a memory stored in the CIO Memory Vault

memory_records.title: NVDA gap-up pattern success
memory_records.content: NVDA gap-ups >2% with volume >2x average have 80% win rate when entered before 10 AM ET. Pattern has been successful in 12 of 15 occurrences.

memory_records.title: Avoid low-volume breakouts
memory_records.content: 3 consecutive losses from low-volume breakouts. Add volume filter: minimum 1.5x average volume required for entry.

memory_records.title: Market Open Battle Plan - 2026-02-06
memory_records.content: Focus on gap-up momentum plays. Watch for NVDA, AMD breakouts. Market regime: RISK_ON. VIX at 16.5 indicates favorable conditions.

memory_records.title: WIN: AAPL +$250
memory_records.content: Profitable trade on AAPL. Strategy: MOMENTUM. Entry: $150.00, Exit: $152.50. Hold duration: 45 minutes. Profit: $250 (1.67%).

note: These examples show different memory types stored in the CIO Memory Vault. Memories influence future trading decisions and system behavior.
